name: PRE_AR_ORG_PX
description: Stores information about current procedure in charge review session. The following details are stored: Quantity (units/days) of procedure, Amount of the procedure, and Modifier if any.

columns.name: TAR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the temporary transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ORG_CHG_PROC_ID
columns.description: Stores current procedure in charge review session.

columns.name: ORG_CHG_MOD
columns.description: Modifier associated with a procedure in charge review session.

columns.name: ORG_CHG_QUANTITY
columns.description: Number of units/days for a procedure in charge review session.

columns.name: ORG_CHG_AMOUNT
columns.description: Charge amount of a procedure in charge review session.

columns.name: ORG_CHG_DX
columns.description: Tells which diagnoses apply to this charge procedure (comma-separated numbers).
